actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code, to provide for an exclusive remedy against the United States in suits based upon acts or omissions of U.S. employees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for an exclusive remedy against the United States in suits based upon acts or omissions of United States employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code, to provide for an exclusive remedy against the United States in suits based upon acts or omissions of U.S. employees, and for other purposes.
